# Plugins

  • @nomiclabs/buidler-truffle4integration with TruffleContract from Truffle 4.
  • @nomiclabs/buidler-truffle5: integration with TruffleContract from Truffle 5.
  • @nomiclabs/buidler-web3: injects Web3 1.x into the Buidler Runtime Environment.
  • @nomiclabs/buidler-web3-legacy: injects Web3 0.20.x into the Buidler Runtime Environment.
  • @nomiclabs/buidler-ethers: injects ethers.js into the Buidler Runtime Environment.
Help us improve this page!
